Instruction: Combine warm water, yeast, sugar, salt, and olive oil in a large bowl. Stir in 2 cups of flour until a soft ball forms. Knead in additional flour for a soft and non-sticky dough. Transfer the kneaded dough to a greased bowl, cover, and allow it to rise until doubled in size.
Knead the dough briefly and shape it into a loaf. Place the loaf on a greased baking sheet. Cover and let it rise for 15 to 20 minutes. Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
